email_content:
Hi Mark,

Here’s a concise summary of the information you’ll need to finalize the Q2 budget forecast:

• We’re projecting roughly a 5 % rise in raw-material costs due to current market conditions.
• Updated negotiated price lists for our main suppliers are posted on the “Q2 Budget Forecast” page in Notion; please reference those figures when adjusting the model.
• A planned shift toward more sustainable materials could raise certain line-item costs in the short term but supports our long-term strategy.
• Contract renegotiations with Suppliers A–C are in progress. The latest terms will flow through to the spreadsheets once finalized.
• Contact information for the new account managers at each supplier is listed in the same Notion page if you need to follow up directly.
• Detailed spreadsheets with figures and supplier breakdowns are available as attachments on the Notion page.

Next steps
1. Review the updated price lists and incorporate them into the master forecast.
2. Apply the 5 % cost uptick across affected categories.
3. Flag any areas where the sustainable-materials initiative may materially impact spend.

Let me know if you need anything else.

Thanks,
[Your Name]
